body:
sputoppm

NAME

sputoppm - convert an Atari uncompressed Spectrum file into a portable pixmap

SYNOPSIS

sputoppm [spufile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads an Atari uncompressed Spectrum file as input. Produces a portable pixmap as output.

SEE ALSO

spctoppm(1), ppm(5)
